# Compression

Next.js providesgzipopen in new windowcompression to compress rendered content and static files. In general you will want to enable compression on a HTTP proxy likenginxopen in new window, to offload load from theNode.jsprocess.

To disablecompression, opennext.config.jsand disable thecompressconfig:

module.exports = {
  compress: false,
}
